I'm a Student Computer Scientist

As an computer scientist, I apply critical thinking to develop solutions with high quality modular code.

About Me

I enjoy learning new systems and concepts, then writing my own version in my preferred languages of C and C++. Systems I've enjoyed learning so far are Game Engines, Web Servers, Graphics Libraries, Text Editors and Emulators. Currently I have 4 years of professional experience as a software developer, doing freelancing, full stack web development and DevOps. On the other hand, I have 10+ years of doing programming as a hobby refining my skills in the craft.

My programming language of choice depends on the context of the project. Ideally I would like to do everything in C++ or C, but depending on the project I will happily write in Python, C#, Javascript or PHP.

I've redesigned my site to use VuePress which will allow me to use markdown in the site. The reason I did this is because I want to do dev blogs on my projects and I enjoy writing in markdown due to how good it looks and how fast/easy it is to write it. All my projects will be avaliable on github (a table of all my projects are below).
